animals.statement: Sloths spend 90% of their lives motionless, which means they are slightly more productive than you.
Mosquitos are as insignificant and unimportant as you but at least people notice when they’re around.
You have the same amount of chins that a cow has stomachs.
Not even a dog would love you.
The fact that jellyfish have survived for 600 million year without a brain gives you hope.
Female dragon flies will pretend to be dead in order to avoid unwanted male advances, I bet you can relate, huh?
A blue whales penis is 12 inches in diameter and 10 feet long making it the worlds second largest dick, after you!
I’ve seen ostriches with better calves than you.
The Mayfly has a lifespan of just 24 hours. I never thought I could envy them, until I met you.
Your mind is screwier than a duck’s penis.
You’re doing an amazing job of showing up turtles. They can only breath out their ass, you can have a whole conversation.
Are you a donkey? Because you look like an ass.
Cockroaches are able to survive the radiation , which explains how every relationship you’ve ever been in going nuclear.
Insulting you by calling you a pig would be an insult to the pigs.
Horses cannot vomit, but Im sure looking at you makes them want to.
Slugs have four noses, meaning they would probably die if they got close enough to smell your bullshit.
